oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Josh Osborne - 2018-03-24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Josh Osborne from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 24, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Josh Osborne;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (00:49) Opening comments and introduction of Josh Osborne by Abi Tapia / (05:53) Opening comments from Josh / (06:29) Performs All The Pretty Girls / (09:32) Talks about how he became a songwriter / (12:12) Introduces the next song / (12:45) Performs Drinkin Problem / (16:26) Talks about where he gets ideas for songs / () Introduces the next song / (18:40) Performs John Cougar, John Deere, John 3:16 / (22:22) Answers question about how he became a songwriter / (24:37) Answers question about common mistakes young songwriters make / (27:08) Answers question about how songwriters get their songs to recording artists / (28:49) Answers question about learning how to play guitar / (30:52) Talks about his wife's influence on his career / (32:23) Talks about the song Merry Go 'Round winning awards / Introduces the next song / (35:03) Performs Settin' The World On Fire / (38:18) Answers question about how old he was when he wrote his first song /

(38:48) Answers question about writing music or lyrics first / (39:50) Talks about the favorite songs that he's written and how meeting Shane McAnally influenced his songwriting career / (43:28) Introduces the next song / (43:57) Performs Body Like A Back Road / (46:41) Final comment / (46:51) Walk-out music / (47:49) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Osborne, Josh; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
